Question: Eypex Home Health dba JustLight CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Eypex Home Health dba JustLight CES 2024

- Acquired JustLight, including the Sunflower Smart Light Therapy lamp
- Offers in-home light therapy for mental and physical wellness
- Utilizes Photobiomodulation (PBM) therapy
- Features Smart Light Therapy and UV germicidal disinfection technologies
- Plans to commercialize an expanded portfolio of health products within the next 18 months
Summary_cn:
Eypex家庭健康公司（即JustLight）CES 2024

- 收购了JustLight，包括向日葵智能光疗灯
- 提供家庭光疗以促进心理和身体健康
- 采用光生物模拟（PBM）疗法
- 具有智能光疗和紫外线杀菌消毒技术
- 计划在未来18个月内商业化一个更广泛的健康产品组合
